attributes.comment:
This is regards to docket # USCIS-2006-0044.

As a waiting family to adopt, this is to inform you, I am very much against the
increase in these fees. They are outragous as it is. With the longer wait times to
travel, most of them have to be redone before we leave to adopt our children from
overseas. That is just wrong. Please do not raise these fees. We are having to
pay twice as it is. I can express enough, that this will not help the process any, it
will just allow fewer people to adopt.

Thank You for your time,
Selina K. King

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Selina K. King
